Text:
How much do you know about the demon Diablos and the
great hero Olivier?

How much do I know...? Isn't that just a fairy tale
everyone in Midgar knows about?
What if I told you it's a hidden historical fact?

Wait a minute. You're saying Diablos actually
existed?!

I know it's hard to believe, but it's true. This
book's emblem is also related to Diablos.
(Then, the mark on my left hand...)
Wasn't the demon Diablos harmful to humans?
So why would anyone try to resurrect him?

Unfortunately, some fools are drawn to immense
power. Not that I even want to understand them.

...If it were the old me, I would have laughed off
the demon's resurrection...
Aurora... Does this have anything to do with you?

...Speak up, answer me. What's your connection to
Diablos?

(Is Claire communicating with Aurora...? Well,
Aurora seems asleep right now anyway.)
Hey, excuse me.
Hey, library lady! Why are you ignoring me?!

Huh? Were you talking to me? Sorry, I just
thought...
...Just thought what?

You're that sort of awkward age where you talk to
yourself.
Whaâ€”?!

(These words are effective with Lady Claire...
Master Shadow also mentioned this before.)

Wh-What the hell?! Quit acting all grown-up!
If you're curious, just say you are!
Hold on, do you want me to ask?
I-I don't... I can't involve unrelated people.
Is that so? Well, that's a shame.
You do want me to ask, don't you?

I-It's not like that! Ah, enough! This topic is
over!

Anyway, tell me more. Who's trying to resurrect the
demon Diablosâ€•
Eeeeeeek!!!
Screaming...?!

Sounds like something's happened at the venue.
You should stay here.
W-Wait a minute!

H-How much should I pay...? How about a million...
no, 2 million zeni? Please, just spare my lifeâ€•
Agh... Ngh...?!

This is a purge. I have plenty of time to kill each
one of you slowly.

Ack... The smell of blood... What the hell is going
on?!
I didn't expect them to move so quickly...

Ah, you're here. Perfect timing. I was planning on
saving you two for last.
How distasteful... Who are you anyway?

I'm Maximilian the Ruthless. There's no point in
remembering my name. You'll all die here.
